title: [Ta'Illistim, Aaendarein Gaer]
description: Secure beneath the shelter of the nearby belltower, the gaer ends upon a rocky outcropping.  Sturdy wooden railings surround the precipice.  Far below, the flickering torchlight illuminates the guards' hut downhill from the Sapphire Gate.

Secure beneath the shelter of the nearby belltower, the gaer ends upon a rocky outcropping.  Sturdy wooden railings surround the precipice.  Far below, wagons can be seen, lined up for inspection by the city guard before entering the Sapphire Gate.

Secure beneath the shelter of the nearby belltower, the gaer ends upon a rocky outcropping.  Sturdy wooden railings surround the precipice.  Far below, the flickering torchlight illuminates the guards' hut downhill from the Sapphire Gate.  Tucked up amidst a cluster of rocks is a marble house roofed in a myriad of crystal panes.

Secure beneath the shelter of the nearby belltower, the gaer ends upon a rocky outcropping.  Sturdy wooden railings surround the precipice.  Far below, wagons can be seen, lined up for inspection by the city guard before entering the Sapphire Gate.  Tucked up amidst a cluster of rocks is a marble house roofed in a myriad of crystal panes.
